attributes.action: Scrap any plans to charge wrongly convicted persons for any form of "service" supplied to them when wrongly incarcerated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having heard about the idea that the bridgwater three are to have their compensation reduce to pay for their board and lodgings. This is adding insult to injury and is immoral.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
